description: From Latin nīdificō (“build a nest”), from nīdus (“nest”) + faciō (“make, do”).

verbs.description: nidify (third-person singular simple present nidifies, present participle nidifying, simple past and past participle nidified)

examples: It is only within the last few years that naturalists have clearly determined that some species of fish make nests for the reception of their spawn  […]  Five or six kinds are now ascertained to nidify; and of these, two belong to the genus Gasterosteus  […]
